ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Mana???
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually you have the wrong charm song there Talies, its the 39 one which is Solons bewitching bravura that is a mana hog, not sirens which is 27 Minkin ...
ygData.messageBody:
Actually you have the wrong charm song there Talies, its the 39 one which is
Solons bewitching bravura that is a mana hog, not sirens which is 27

Minkin


-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: July 26, 2001 3:37 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Mana???

On Bards and Mana:
Bards use mana for two songs: Denon's Desperate Dirge (an area effect
instant-damage) and Solon's Song of the Sirens (a charm song). Denon's
tends to use all of your mana in one shot - mana-improving items don't
appear to matter there. SSS slowly eats your mana while charming
creatures. One thing of note: Bards are completely unaffected by any
sort of mana-refreshing or buffing song or spell. In other words, Breeze,
Clarity, etc. have no effect on Bards. It's a small sacrifice for having
99 percent of our songs mana-free.

Talies the Wanderer
